thread.section_title: The Maritime Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: New favorite NYC Hotel
thread.title_full: New favorite NYC Hotel - Review of The Maritime Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Amanda M
title: New favorite NYC Hotel
text: Not one bad thing to say. Great location near Chelsea Market, easy to get to lots of things. Interior was well thought out with the old school ship theme but not kitschy. Surprised to have decent continental breakfast included. Staff was everything you'd want in your stay. I hope to bring my Navy Sailor husband back here one day. He would love love love it!
